metadata.description: Claude Code skills for TypeScript, React, Node.js, ArkType, LiftKit, Gmail, Google Cloud, and more

plugins.name: coding-with-arktype
plugins.description: Claude Code plugin for ArkType validation — 6 skills, 3 agents, 3 commands, 2 scripts, and 5 templates covering schemas, morphs, scopes, errors, integrations, and migration

plugins.name: coding-with-liftkit
plugins.description: Claude Code plugin for LiftKit UI framework — 10 skills, 4 agents, 4 commands, 5 scripts, and 6 templates for building golden-ratio UIs with Next.js

plugins.name: coding-with-node
plugins.description: Claude Code plugin for Node.js v24 — 19 skills, 4 agents, 4 commands, 6 scripts, and 7 templates covering runtime, async, streams, modules, testing, crypto, security, and more

plugins.name: coding-with-react
plugins.description: React 18/19 — 10 skills, 4 agents, 4 commands covering actions, server components, streaming SSR, compiler, transitions, error boundaries, patterns, and testing

plugins.name: coding-with-typescript
plugins.description: Claude Code skills for writing safe, modern TypeScript — core patterns, async, generics, narrowing, validation, tooling, and more

plugins.name: claude-skill-scholar
plugins.description: Research, produce, test, evaluate, and maintain Claude Code skills — 5 skills, 5 agents, 6 commands, 7 scripts, and 12 templates for the full skill lifecycle

plugins.name: typescript-7-lsp-hooks
plugins.description: TypeScript diagnostics for Claude Code — uses tsgo (TypeScript 7 Go compiler) as a fast LSP server to surface type errors after edits

plugins.name: using-gmail-with-gog-cli
plugins.description: Claude Code skills for reading Gmail via the gog CLI — auth setup, searching, reading messages, and checking new emails

plugins.name: using-google-cloud-console
plugins.description: Claude Code skills for navigating Google Cloud Console via Chrome integration — creating projects, enabling APIs, and configuring OAuth credentials

plugins.name: using-google-gemini-apis
plugins.description: Claude Code plugin for Google Gemini APIs — 7 skills, 2 agents, 2 commands covering Live API streaming, Veo video generation, and Nano Banana image generation in Python and TypeScript

plugins.name: coding-with-astro
plugins.description: Claude Code plugin for Astro 5/6 — 17 skills, 2 agents, 2 commands covering components, routing, content collections, SSR, actions, middleware, sessions, view transitions, framework islands, endpoints, Astro DB, and Astro 6 features

plugins.name: coding-with-tanstack-start
plugins.description: Claude Code plugin for TanStack Start (React) — 13 skills, 2 agents, 2 commands covering server functions, middleware, routing, data loading, SSR, SPA mode, static prerendering, authentication, deployment, and more

plugins.name: coding-with-tanstack-router
plugins.description: Claude Code plugin for TanStack Router (React) — 10 skills, 2 agents, 2 commands covering type-safe routing, code splitting, data loading, context, head management, navigation blocking, route masking, preloading, and render optimizations

plugins.name: coding-with-tanstack-query
plugins.description: Claude Code plugin for TanStack Query (React Query) — 12 skills, 2 agents, 2 commands covering queries, mutations, caching, optimistic updates, infinite queries, prefetching, Suspense, SSR, testing, and TypeScript patterns

plugins.name: coding-with-tanstack-form
plugins.description: Claude Code plugin for TanStack Form (React) — 10 skills, 2 agents, 2 commands covering form setup, validation, composition, arrays, submission, linked fields, listeners, reactivity, SSR, and TypeScript patterns

plugins.name: coding-with-tanstack-virtual
plugins.description: Claude Code plugin for TanStack Virtual (React) — 6 skills, 2 agents, 1 command covering list virtualization, grids, tables, scroll control, infinite scroll, sticky headers, and performance patterns
